title: Baked Chicken Breast
description: Baked Chicken Breast - Kenji L처pez-Alt tested
steps: Pat chicken very dry. Season generously.
Heat oil in oven-safe skillet over medium-high until smoking.
Add chicken, sear without moving until golden, 4-5 minutes.
Transfer to 425째F oven. Roast until 160째F internal, 10-15 minutes.
Rest 5 minutes. Spoon pan juices over chicken.
notes: Use thermometer - overcooked breast is dry.
